data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Fire & Smoke Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Indulge in the smoky ashes of apocalyptic doom with the Fire & Smoke DLC pack. Containing two scorching weapon skins, usable on all in-game guns, it’s time to light up your enemies’ lives with the burning gift of flame.

Features:
  • Dark Embers (weapon skin)
  • Inferno (weapon skin)
  • Molten Lava (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
